seo.title: Rival Ink Tattoo Salford - Premium Custom Tattoos
seo.description: Award-winning tattoo studio in Salford specializing in custom designs. Expert artists, sterile environment, exceptional artistry. Book your consultation today.

openGraph.title: Rival Ink Tattoo Salford - Where Art Meets Rebellion
openGraph.description: Premium tattoo studio in Salford creating custom artwork that tells your story. Expert artists, sterile environment, exceptional results.

headline: Unleash Your
Inner Rebel
hero.subheadline: Premium custom tattoos crafted by award-winning artists in the heart of Salford
hero.imageAlt: Professional tattoo artist working on detailed custom tattoo at Rival Ink Tattoo Salford

portfolio.subtitle: Every tattoo tells a story. Here are some of our recent custom creations that showcase our artistic range and attention to detail.

sessions.subtitle: Choose the perfect session for your tattoo vision
sessions.guarantee: 100% satisfaction guarantee or we'll work with you until it's perfect

testimonials.quote: Marcus at Rival Ink created the most incredible sleeve for me. The attention to detail is phenomenal and the whole experience was professional from start to finish.
testimonials.author: Sarah Mitchell

testimonials.quote: Been to many tattoo shops but Rival Ink is on another level. Clean, professional, and the artwork speaks for itself. Couldn't be happier with my piece.
testimonials.author: James Rodriguez

paragraphs: Marcus Thompson founded Rival Ink Tattoo Salford with a vision to create a space where art truly meets rebellion. With over 8 years of experience and training under some of the UK's most renowned tattoo artists, Marcus specializes in bold, custom designs that push creative boundaries.

Every piece at Rival Ink is a collaboration between artist and client, ensuring your tattoo is not just beautiful, but deeply personal. We believe in taking the time to understand your story and translating it into artwork that you'll be proud to wear for life.
about.callout: Your story deserves to be told through exceptional art
about.imageAlt: Marcus Thompson, founder and lead artist at Rival Ink Tattoo Salford

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We typically book 2-4 weeks in advance depending on the size and complexity of your piece. For larger custom work, we recommend booking even earlier to allow proper time for design development.

items.question: What's included in the consultation?
items.answer: Every consultation includes design discussion, sizing, placement advice, and a detailed quote. We'll work with you to refine the concept until it's exactly what you envision.

finalCta.headline: Ready to Start Your Tattoo Journey?
finalCta.subheadline: Book your consultation today and let's create something extraordinary together

booking.modalDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment and discuss your tattoo vision.
booking.successMessage: Thanks for your interest! We'll review your request and get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your appointment
